thread.section_title: ChinaFlower214 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 ChinaFlower214 的点评意见 | www.chinaflower214.com
thread.title: Chris Roebuck
thread.title_full: ChinaFlower214 的点评人 Chris Roebuck

author: Chris Roebuck
title: Chris Roebuck
text:
I was expecting the flowers to be delivered in a few days however the service was well above what I have ever had. The flowers were delivered same day in a matter of hours. I am very pleased and will use your service again. Everyone i know that needs flowers send I will send your way.
Thanks for the service.
Chris
